channel.title: Still cant connect to my server
channel.description:
Im running the server. Ive port fowarded. Ive made the ip 0.0.0.0 like the creator said to do. I still get an error connecting to server. Heres one thing though. When i search "server =", there are 2 server ips. Was i suposse to make one 0.0.0.0 and one the server ip? If so, which one do i make the server ip, and which one do i make 0.0.0.0? This is actually a SERVER problem mods, not a CLIENT problem. Well, its slightly both. But more of a server problem.
Theres a ip in the client in the source, i changed that into 0.0.0.0 Was i suposse to do that?

item.title: Still cant connect to my server
item.dc:creator: @OjamaBoy OjamaBoy
item.description:

Im running the server.
Ive port fowarded.
Ive made the ip 0.0.0.0 like the creator said to do.
I still get an error connecting to server.

This is actually a SERVER problem mods, not a CLIENT problem.
